about_the_game:
Play as a space ranger, who has been tasked to defeat the evil Techno Dragons, who have inhabited an old planet in the hopes that they can get to control the world! Stop them, Ranger, before the dragon's plan comes to completion!

As the legendary Space Ranger, you collect upgrades to improve your battle power, go down winding caves to uncover mysteries, and defeat the Techno Dragons to maintain peace in the galaxy! Find the carefully hidden batteries to improve your health, or find secret beam upgrades to destroy tougher enemies! Have fun protecting the galaxy in this half an hour long romp through a platformer like it's the 90's!

Find the carefully hidden batteries to improve your health, or find secret beam upgrades to destroy tougher enemies! Have fun protecting the galaxy in this half an hour long romp through a platformer like it's the 90's!
name: Mini Ranger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIndows 7
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any card
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: this game has almost no real overhead
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: was created with rtx 3060 ti and equivalent cpu
